channel.title: Someone please please please help!

item.title: Someone please please please help!
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

  1. Go into player.java

  2. Search for
    Code:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player
  1. Should see something along these lines
    Code:// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY;

With XXXX and YYYY being numbers

  1. Modify the XXXX to the new X coordinates and modify YYYY to the new Y Coordinates

  2. Save>Compile>Run and that should be it

ALL CREDITS TO HAPPYMAN FOR POSTING THIS JUST ABOUT 5 MINUTES AGO.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone please please please help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi i wanted to know how to change the cord of the npcs at my home like when i look it up in client.java the npc id all it says is else if (NPCID == 2253) { /Rich guy/
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
if((cluelevel == 1) && (cluestage == 5) && (clueid == 2))
{
NpcWanneTalk = 32;
}
else
{
sendMessage(“This man isn’t interested in talking right now…”);
}

where do i put the cordinets to change where he is please pelase help is very much appriciated
